title: Why these Black designers own winter coat fashion now
description: Winter coats have evolved far beyond their practical purpose of keeping you warm. A new wave of Black designers is transforming outerwear into powerful fashion statements that blend creativity, cultural significance and cutting-edge style. These six design la…
